name: Impetum Maleficus
description:
Things are pretty weird during a Wizard Apocalypse. Try to get to safety, before it's too late!

-

Impetum Maleficus was created in Inform 7. For more information, type "about" while playing.

This game scored 8th place in The Ryan Veeder Exposition for Good Interactive Fiction 2016.

Written and programmed by Hamish McIntyre. Cover art also by Hamish McIntyre.
